item.content:encoded: Grand Theft Hamlet is a documentary film, kind of. It‚Äôs also an experimental theater project. item.title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth - Official Custom Chocobo Steam Deck Trailer | IGN Japan games
item.description: Check out this fun and feathery new Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth trailer, showing off a custom Chocobo Steam Deck in celebration of Square Enix's action RPG coming to PC (Steam, Epic Games Store) on Januar...
item.content:encoded: Check out this fun and feathery new Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth trailer, showing off a custom Chocobo Steam Deck in celebration of Square Enix's action RPG coming to PC (Steam, Epic Games Store) on January 23, 2025. FF7 Rebirth is officially Steam Deck verified, meaning it passes all compatibility checks and does not require any additional configuration to access all game functionality. Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is also available to play now on PS5 (PlayStation 5).
